name: The Price For Blood
description:
Plot

"It's been almost a hundred years since vampires reaveled themselves and started coexisting with humans.

However, with each year passing, humans saw their liberties and their rights diminishing, until they were reduced to little more than pets.

One day, you just had enough of such a treatment. You gathered a crowd and started to march towards the vampire government, with the intent of making things change. Hopefully for the best..."

The game

The Price of Blood is a narrative game. Everything is done by left clicking.  
Take a sit and enjoy this 5 minutes story.

The game features 7 different endings and adaptative storylines.
